item.title: Orbi Hacking
item.description: Orbi Hacking Intro System Details UART Root Shell Firmware Extraction Conclusion Intro I have been watching some hardware hacking videos on YouTube recently and wanted to try for myself. I found an old pair of Orbis one is a router and another is a satellite. Neither of which were in use, they also hadn’t been updated in a while which made them perfect to try hardware hacking for the first time.
